title: Little By Little (Rich Wilkerson Jr.)
description: Faith, change, growth… it all happens little by little. In this message from Pastor Rich Wilkerson Jr. of VOUS Church, we’re shown how faith isn’t an event, but a process – and that your waiting isn’t wasted.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Faith, change, growth… it all happens little by little. In this message from Pastor Rich Wilkerson Jr. of VOUS Church, we’re shown how faith isn’t an event, but a process – and that your waiting isn’t wasted.
